attr.title: Quest of Graal DX
attr.desc: Fast-paced platform racer where players battle through monsters, traps, and magical mayhem to reach the golden cup first. Featuring more than 20 levels inspired by Arthurian legend, it blends cooperation and betrayal with weapons, magic, and powerful golden statues.
attr.inst: Purchase the game at itch.io (https://pixel-boy.itch.io/quest-of-graal-dx). Download the Quest Of Graal LINUX.rar version, extract, and copy the Quest Of Graal LINUX.pck file to the questofgraaldx folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game at [itch.io](https://pixel-boy.itch.io/quest-of-graal-dx). Download the `Quest Of Graal LINUX.rar` version, extract, and copy the `Quest Of Graal LINUX.pck` file to the `questofgraaldx` folder.
